Statute.Title: Budget Implementation Act, 2006, No. 2
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Exécution du budget de 2006, Loi no 2 d’)

CIF.Text: CIF, 2007, c. 2 in force on assent 21.02.2007. See also various provisions throughout re application and coming into force:

Item.Text: — ss. 55(1), 58(1), 59(2), 60(1), 61(1), 62(1) and 63(1) are deemed in force 01.07.2006 see respectively ss. 55(2), 58(2), 59(2), 60(2), 61(2) also re reference and 63(2) also re reference and application
